test_strategy.heading: Testing Strategy
test_strategy.content:
**Release Criteria:**
- All test cases pass (100% pass rate)
- Performance benchmarks met
- Security scan results approved
- User acceptance testing completed
- Documentation updated and reviewed

test_cases.heading: Test Cases & Scenarios
test_cases.content:
**Test Case 1: AI Integration**
- Preconditions: User authenticated and has appropriate permissions
- Test Steps: Navigate to ai integration, execute core functionality, verify results
- Expected Result: Feature operates as designed with proper data handling
- Pass Criteria: All functionality accessible, data accuracy maintained, performance within limits

**Test Case 2: Data Export/Import**
- Preconditions: User authenticated and has appropriate permissions
- Test Steps: Navigate to data export/import, execute core functionality, verify results
- Expected Result: Feature operates as designed with proper data handling
- Pass Criteria: All functionality accessible, data accuracy maintained, performance within limits

edge_cases.heading: Edge Cases & Error Handling
edge_cases.content:
**Boundary Testing:**
- Maximum concurrent users (1,000+)
- Large data set processing
- Network connectivity issues
- Browser compatibility edge cases

**Error Conditions:**
- Invalid input data handling
- Authentication failures
- Database connection issues
- Third-party service unavailability
- Resource exhaustion scenarios

**Exception Handling:**
- Graceful degradation when services are unavailable
- Clear error messages for user guidance
- Automatic retry mechanisms for transient failures

performance_testing.heading: Performance Testing
performance_testing.content:
**Load Testing Scenarios:**
- Normal load: 100 concurrent users
- Peak load: 500 concurrent users  
- Stress testing: 1000+ concurrent users
- Endurance testing: 24-hour continuous operation

**Performance Benchmarks:**
- Page load time: <2 seconds
- API response time: <200ms
- Database query time: <100ms
- Memory usage: <1GB per instance

automation_strategy.heading: Test Automation
automation_strategy.content:
**Automation Framework:** 
- Test framework: Mocha/Chai
- Browser automation: Selenium WebDriver
- API testing: REST Assured or Postman
- Performance testing: JMeter or LoadRunner

**CI/CD Integration:**
- Automated test execution on code commits
- Test result reporting and notifications
- Quality gates for deployment approval
- Regression test suite for releases

validation_criteria.heading: Acceptance Validation
validation_criteria.content:
**Release Criteria:**
- All test cases pass (100% pass rate)
- Performance benchmarks met
- Security scan results approved
- User acceptance testing completed
- Documentation updated and reviewed
